code.game.models

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • code.game.models.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends java.util.Observable
    the main class of game's map, performing essential tasks about map acts as an observable
    Author:
    Umer
